name: Big Cat Royal Pack 2.0
description: A red pack from Big Cat, a precious new year present!

name: Big Cat Voucher I
description: The voucher issued by Kafra. It can be used to experience Fantasy Generator I. (Warm tips from Kafra: the voucher should not be used at the same time with Big Cat Coin.)

name: Big Cat Voucher II
description: The voucher issued by Kafra. It can be used to experience Fantasy Generator II. (Warm tips from Kafra: the voucher should not be used at the same time with Big Cat Coin.)

name: Big Cat Voucher III
description: The voucher issued by Kafra. It can be used to experience Fantasy Generator III. (Warm tips from Kafra: the voucher should not be used at the same time with Big Cat Coin.)

name: Big Cat Voucher·Feast
description: The voucher issued by Kafra. It can be used to experience Fantasy Generator Feast. (Warm tips from Kafra: the voucher should not be used at the same time with Big Cat Coin.)

name: Big Cat Wedding Voucher
description: Issued by Big Cat wedding company~ Redeem a wedding schedule within the next 21 days from Miss Happiness~

name: Big Cat's Lucky Bag
description: To thank the adventurers for their support, Kafra Company has launched this Party Gratitude Pack, which contains Gorgeous Card Album x1, Valkyrie's Gift x2, Silver Medal x10. (each account is allowed to purchase this gratitude pack 3 times per month)

name: Big Cat's New Year Red Packet
description: As the wealthiest cat on this land, I'm giving each of you a new year red packet~ Meow~

name: Big Ribbon
description: Big butterfly knot. It makes woman more cute and beautiful.

name: Big Ribbon [1]
description: A large bow that can make women more lovely and beautiful. (As a graduation gift, it's been quite popular among high school students.)

name: Big Ribbon [1] Blueprint
description: Big butterfly knot. It makes woman more cute and beautiful.

name: Bill Guisarme [1]
description: A spear with a curved blade at the top cannot only be used for stabbing, but also for chopping.

name: Bill Guisarme [2]
description: A spear with a curved blade at the top cannot only be used for stabbing, but also for chopping.

name: Billow
description: On windy days, the surging waves make sculptures.

name: Biotite
description: Mica that resembles black scales. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Biretta
description: Hat that at gives an air of authority when you put it on and symbolizes clergyman.
